document_data.mainbody:
ardyl Crownsilver was an apprentice of Vangerdahast in the mid-14 century DR, also his scribe and messenger.
She was curvaceous but slender, tall and graceful.
She trusted Vangerdahast thoroughly, and was in turn trusted by him.
She did not have much in the way of guard spells, but she was graceful and quiet.
She was Vangerdahasts scribe and messenger in Alturiak of , when Bolifar Geldert went missing. She had given the man the key to the room where he was to write his report, and sought him out for Vangerdahast afterwards, when the latters patience ran out. She was the one to discover the empty room, with no trace of Bolifar Geldert.
